channel.description: This combinations example shows the Creative Commons, Dublin Core and the Apple iTunes extensions all being used together in a single feed.
channel.title: OpSound Random Blues Tracks

item.title: WEST NILE PAPYRUS
item.description: Instrumental track with feelings of trance and a bit of Floyd. Just a 'sit back and vegetate on it' kind of thing.
item.dc:creator: The Dejunair Project
item.itunes:author: The Dejunair Project
item.itunes:subtitle: Instrumental track
item.itunes:summary: Instrumental track with feelings of trance and a bit of Floyd. Just a 'sit back and vegetate on it' kind of thing.

item.title: THE DEVIL IS CROSSING ME
item.description: there's just plain bad and then there's somebody who doesn't need regular sympathy
